meanings.definition: An object that is already made and ready to use.
meanings.sent1: I bought a readymade cake for the party.
meanings.sent2: The store sells readymade curtains for convenience.
meanings.sent3: The readymade sandwich looked so perfect, it seemed almost too good to eat.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a readymade solution to brightening up a room.
meanings.sent5: The readymade furniture was so easy to assemble, it felt like magic.

meanings.definition: Something that is made in advance and available for immediate use.
meanings.sent1: The emergency kit contained readymade supplies for any situation.
meanings.sent2: The readymade meals at the supermarket are a lifesaver for busy families.
meanings.sent3: He always kept a readymade excuse in his back pocket, just in case.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a readymade remedy for a bad day.
meanings.sent5: The readymade solution to the problem was right in front of them all along.
